timeline.message:
Privacy improvements for manual payout

Redesign the UI
Add import/export of payout settings
Add ability to import from mediation ticket
Mediator does not need private key
User can sign using own wallet or private key
Validation of input fields
Calculate the tx fee based on inputs
Display of the generated txid & hex so it can be checked

timeline.bodyText: Coin.parseCoin can throw exceptions if input format is not as expected. Best to add a try catch...
timeline.author: chimp1984

replies.bodyText: I'll wait for this before I cherry-pick.
replies.author: ripcurlx

timeline.message: review fix: try..catch around all parseCoin()
